'''Cara McAdams''' was a patient at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]] who had facial reconstruction surgery.

==History==
Cara was in the hospital to get facial reconstruction after an accident left her with scars on her face. Her surgery was pro bono because her insurance had capped out.

Jackson explained the surgery to her, saying they would harvest skin from her back and scalp and her new scars would be hidden in her facial plains. He showed her the simulation of what her face would look like, which excited her.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She and [[Carlos McAdams]] are married.

==Career==
She is a kindergarten teacher. She was worried that she wouldn't be able to return to work without the surgery because she didn't want her face to scare the kids.
